snippet: At least 67 cattle thieves were killed by villagers when the thieves attacked a number of villages over the weekend, officials said Monday.
abstract: Villagers in Madagascar kill at least 67 cattle thieves after about 100 rustlers simultaneously attacked three villages, prompting residents to go after the thieves with spades, spears and machetes.
lead_paragraph: At least 67 cattle thieves were killed by villagers when the thieves attacked a number of villages over the weekend, officials said Monday.

headline.seo: Villagers Kill Cattle Thieves in Madagascar
headline.main: Madagascar: Villagers Fend Off Attacks by Gang Seeking Cattle
headline.print_headline: Madagascar: Villagers Fend Off Attacks by Gang Seeking Cattle
